variants.name: JN-3 Sedan
variants.description: A four-door, four-wheeled passenger vehicle with a closed body and a trunk compartment at the rear. Sedans are known for their comfort, fuel efficiency, and versatility.

variants.name: JN-X SUV
variants.description: A sport utility vehicle, designed for off-road use and hauling cargo. SUVs are characterized by their raised ground clearance, four-wheel drive, and spacious interior.

variants.name: JN-S Roadster
variants.description: A high-performance automobile designed for speed and agility. Sports cars often have powerful engines, aerodynamic body shapes, and advanced handling features.
